segments.text: That sink overflowing is just gross, water spilling all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the filthy puddleâ€”yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes like it's no big deal, spreading the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by the dirty water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, grubby hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing on a stool that's probably not clean either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're about to drop crumbs everywhere on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, no doubt getting sticky too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks nice, but inside it's a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing food stolen like that in such conditions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place will smell musty from the water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is repulsive with all the negligence and grime.
segments.speaker: PAR
